reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major supratentorial brain tumor types: cerebral gliomas (~8 per 100k), cerebral meningiomas (~6 per 100k), pituitary adenomas (~2.5 per 100k), oligodendrogliomas (~0.5 per 100k), other (~1.5 per 100k) = ~18.5 per 100k. Umbrella term encompassing diverse tumor types with heterogeneous incidence rates. Low confidence due to category heterogeneity and overlap potential.
source: GLOBOCAN 2005 brain tumor data aggregated by anatomical location
